name: Minigolf Park VR
description: Welcome to Minigolf Park VR! In Minigolf Park VR you wil experience playing minigolf in virtual reality on a variety of courses. No need for power meters and swing indicators. The motion controls provide a realistic experience and immersion. Go at it on your own in singleplayer or have fun together with your friends in the online multiplayer mode. Currently the game features two courses with 18 holes each. The classic course will provide you with a relaxed and fun experience while the space course will challenge you with different gadgets like ufos, lasers, gravity planets and wormholes.
